articles.title: GST: Modi's tax cuts will give India a festive spending boost - BBC

articles.content:

articles.title: WNBA playoffs: Fever take Game 1 with decisive 89-73 win over Aces in semifinal matchup - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Indiana continues its surprise postseason run while Kelsey Mitchell keeps putting up superstar numbers.
articles.content:
The Indiana Fever continued its surprising postseason run with an 89-73 win over the Las Vegas Aces in Game 1 of their WNBA semifinal playoff series.
